content: Hi, I'm going to be a summer research associate at Topos from June-August. Is anybody going to be there during that period and wants to live together like we did last summer? Two of the other summer research associates are already interested.
@Christian Williams @Owen Lynch @Evan Patterson @David Jaz @Nelson Niu @Sophie Libkind & whoever else I am forgetting
I'm going to be moving to Berkeley permanently in August, I'd could potentially have a couch crasher depending on my situation
Wonâ€™t be there this summer (although I may visit at some point) but have fun!
I'm hopefully going to be there either late June or early September, only for a week or two.
